body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom Home, HEPA Air Purifiers Air Cleaner For Pets Allergies, Virus Air Purifier for Dust, Portable Baby Air Purifier With Low Noise Sleep Mode for Office & Room, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 37 mins
features: High Efficiency Particle Filtration: ToLife Air Purifier features a true HEPA air filter that captures 99.97% of particles, and the 360°outlet design refreshes the air up to 5 times an hour, effectively filtering out particles such as smoke, odors, dander, hair, and other particles, greatly improving indoor air quality and your physical and mental health.

360 Degree Air Flow: Innovative 360-degree air intake technology continuously refreshes air in rooms up to 215 square feet (20 square meters) per hour, allowing fresh air to cover every corner of the room, making it the perfect choice for home living.

Low Decibel Operation: Our air purifiers come with a night mode that minimizes fan speed when sleep mode is activated, effectively eliminating any noticeable sound. The noise level of the filtered air is as low as 25 decibels, providing effective purification while creating a peaceful and relaxing indoor environment for you and your family.

Customize Your Room Scent: Our ToLife air purifiers feature an aromatherapy cartridge underneath the air vents that can be filled with 3-4 drops of your favorite essential oils. As the purifier circulates fresh air, the scent will fill the room, creating a comfortable, healthy and cozy environment for you and your family.

Please Change Filter: To ensure the health and safety of you and your family, our HEPA air purifier is equipped with a 2000-hour filter replacement reminder. Once the purifier has been in use for more than 2000 hours, a red indicator light will illuminate to remind you to change the filter cartridge. For optimal performance, we recommend changing the filter cartridge every 3-6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for what I was looking for! Something small but makes enough noise to drown other noises for me to sleep. And also filter my bedroom since I have two dogs and allergies. The noise levels are perfect, and adjustable with three settings. Also has light modes to turn on and off and a sleep mode. Definitely better quality than I expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, a modern designed air purifier that works efficiently in any small space!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Air purifiers are niche products nowadays but you won't realize the advantage of having such a product in the home until you use it at your home and see the dirt being collected in the filters while doing regular cleaning of the product. I already have 2 bigger air purifiers in my home that clean our living area and bedroom respectively. Got this to use in our small office room since we tend to use that room regularly due to working from home. I have used it for the last few days now and here is my take. I would highly recommend this product. It is one of the fanciest small purifiers I have ever seen.My 2 cents below:Pros:- It does the job of an air purifier very well as we can feel the difference in the dust in the office room- Different levels of fan control. You won't hear anything when on speed1 or in sleep mode. Very silent- 3-layer filtration in this product air purification– Сapture smoke, dust, odors, and allergens- Very fancy looks and gives a great aesthetic to the home while in use- Timer functionality is nice to have with 6 settings (2h/4h/6h/8h/10h/12h) available- Overall it is quiet, even at the highest fan speed. Refer to my attached video- Aromathy pad section that lets you add essential oils in it for fragrance. This is something that I have seen very first time in any air purifier- Great build quality and feels very premium- Detailed manual with all steps and troubleshooting details- The manufacturer provides a 1-year warrantyCons:- I wish it had smart WiFi connectivity to control it remotely or at least a remote control was included- No real-time AQI (Air Quality Index) numbers are displayed to keep informed. Both of my other purifiers do show those and it is convenient to have a track on it. No auto mode in these purifiers, so I believe it misses the sensor that detects the air quality index

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job
reviews.reviewText: I've had this in my basement bathroom / washroom for over a month now, and it does exactly what I need it to and does it well. Unfortunately, our downstairs basement bathroom does not have any sort of fan to turn on so any smells tend to linger. On top of that there can be some funny smells from the shower drain and this filter purifier fixes that right up. I really like the control system and all the different options and button layout. The silent mode really is extremely quiet but still can get some work done while at the same time the highest setting can clear out the smell from a room very quickly without being insanely loud. The design looks really nice and the handle is appreciated. The little scent tray is nice and with just two drops of an oil that'll last up to 3 days, it just depends if you're constantly running it or only turn it on when you need it. I also really appreciate the ability to check how much time is left on your filter so you know once it has essentially expired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It circulates and keeps air smelling clean and cuts down on dust and particles in the air. Good quality and price. Quiet too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clears Dust Effectively
reviews.reviewText: One of the standout features for me is its effectiveness in combating pet odors and allergens, making it a must-have for households with furry companions. The purifier's sleek design seamlessly integrates into any room decor, and its compact size is perfect for bedrooms or smaller living spaces. What sets it apart is its thoughtful timer function, which allows me to set it for specific periods, ensuring that it's not running unnecessarily throughout the day.For someone like me who's conscious of energy consumption, this feature is a game-changer. It strikes the perfect balance between efficiency and functionality, ensuring optimal air quality without wasting electricity. But perhaps the most significant benefit is its impact on air quality, especially for those prone to allergies or asthma. Since incorporating the Tolife Air Purifier into my bedroom, I've noticed a marked improvement in air freshness and overall respiratory comfort. It effectively captures airborne particles and pollutants, creating a healthier indoor environment for rest and relaxation.For anyone seeking relief from allergens or pollutants, or simply looking to breathe easier at home, I highly recommend the Tolife Air Purifier. It's a worthwhile investment in both comfort and well-being, supporting a cleaner, fresher living space for you and your loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Air Purifier for a Great for Small to Medium sized rooms.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this air purifier, it helps take out all the dust particles that are in the room you are in & works very well. The control panel on the top is very easy to use (it is touch screen) so any one will be able to control the air purifier to their likeness. I also like that there is a Fan setting so you can control the speed of the fan Level 1-3, also there is a sleep timer so you can set it & the fan will go off at a certain time so you don’t have to get up & turn it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how the system works. I love timer function and never think about it. Takes a small space and I keep it next to my work table, and I really fill the fresh air. Looks great experience. Want to try the essential oil, it's interesting feature for different mood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Good
reviews.reviewText: Works Wonderful, especially for the price. Might need to replace the filter a bit more often than compared to other purifiers, especially if let it run constantly. Enough noise variation across 3 levels, and timer feature goes by 2-hour increments.

This is a great size for the bedroom side table and I really like the settings on it. It has a nighttime setting that’s really quiet and yet still exchanging the air has a timer a few other settings. It also has a light you can have on if you want to it’s a really nice little unit I’m gonna buy another one I think.

I bought this for my son who wakes up stuffy and has a hard time sleeping. I'm happy to report that from the first night he used it, it helped. No more stuffiness in the mornings or trouble sleeping. He uses the highest setting and the volume doesn’t bother him. Easy to set up and use. Very happy with this air purifier.

I absolutely love this product! I let it run all night and sometimes during the day. It is not at all loud and the fact that it has three levels for the fan is very convenient. The bottom half lights up and has a very soft light. Practical, affordable, and effective product

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute portable night time air purifier
reviews.reviewText: I have not had this for long but do enjoy it so far . Pardon the lighting in my phots, it does look accurate to description.I have not tried timer modes, but enjoyed night mode so far. Nice white noise for me and device is dim . Optional LED during day.Easy to put together in under 5 min. English instructions seem translated but easy to understand and follow with images . Don't forget to remove internal filter bag from bottom before use.Elderly cat is breathing better around it , and filter seems to catch fur floating in air fine.Partner and I are happy with it so far .I will update if anything changes.

recently got a stinky kitten and this purifier helps keep our air fresh in our small apartment. i also love that little tray that allows you to put essential oils in to make your room smell great. definitely will think about getting another for our living room . the timer is great too in case you forget to turn it off! the size is also perfect for our room, you can stick it anywhere.
